snippet.title: Rim Battle Planets [GAMEPLAY] - PC
snippet.description:
Rim Battle Planets gameplay from PC.
Pure Rim Battle Planets gameplay without comment.
#nocommentary

RIM: Battle Planets is a strategy that takes players to a distant future when a great galactic armed conflict breaks out between six different races. We will play the role of commander of the earthly armed forces and we must lead our forces to victory. Gamers are about to be pushed right to the limits as they make life and death decisions in the distant galaxy of the Outer Rim. Players take the responsibility of being Commander Max Adamski, an experienced leader of men, who finds himself in the middle of a violent galactic war. It's now the duty of the gamer to take control of the situation and survive as the deadly plot unfurls.
